hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Mas'ud: A deputation of the jinn came to the Prophet (ﷺ) and said: O Muhammad, forbid your community to cleans themselves with a bone or dung or charcoal, for in them Allah has provided sustenance for us. So the Prophet (ﷺ) forbade them to do so

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُنْهَى عَنْهُ أَنْ يُسْتَنْجَى بِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Objects With Which It Is Prohibited To Purify Oneself
